english: Choose a name for the scenario (max 30 characters).

english: Unable to find or process SETTINGS file.\nForced application shutdown has started.

english: Unable to find (or communicate with) the audio device.\nNo sound will be played as long as the error persists.
italian: Impossibile trovare (o comunicare con) il dispositivo audio.\nNessun sarà riprodotto alcun suono finché l'errore persiste.
spanish: No se puede encontrar (o comunicar con) el dispositivo de audio.\nNo se reproducirá ningún sonido mientras persista el error.
french: Impossible de trouver (ou de communiquer avec) le périphérique audio.\n Aucun son sera reproduit tant que l'erreur persiste.
arabic: audio.\n ﻏﻴﺮ ﻗﺎدر ﻋﻟﻰ اﻟﻌﺜﻮر أو (اﻟﺗﻮاﺻﻞ) ٳﻟﻰ اﻟﺠﻬﺎز اﻟﺼﻮﺗﻲ. ﻹﻏﻼق ٳﻟﺰاﻣﻲ ﻟﻠﺘﻄﺒﻴﻖ
